description: Goods, SSC SW-103240 NETAPP Extended Renewal - Amendment 000
full_summary:
**NETAPP Extended Renewal Government Tender Announcement**

**Title** : SW-103240 NETAPP Extended Renewal

**Reference Number** : SSC-24-00025920:T

**Publication Date** : March 4, 2024

**Tender Closing Date** : March 13, 2024 (14:00 EST)

[It seems that this tender announcement is for the renewal of NETAPP equipment software. Let me rephrase the entry in a way that excludes unnecessary information, while still conveying the essence of the announcement.]

**Procurement Category**
* The procurement category for this tender announcement is Goods (GD).

**Request Type**
* This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) under a competitive, open bidding method.

**End User**
* The Government of Canada is seeking proposals for the renewal of NETAPP equipment software to support the needs of Shared Services Canada.

**Location**
* The contract will be executed and the services will be provided in the National Capital Region (NCR).

**Important Dates**
* Publication Date: March 4, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: March 13, 2024 (14:00 EST)

**Attachments**
* Documents available for download at: https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/9B1AE3CF-2CE8-4075-98D5-7C1FC570331E,https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/FA5CD389-7DE1-4156-A835-903DBD53E481

**Contact Information**
* Eleanor Cesare
* Phone: 613 219-8366
* Fax: 613 960-6026
* Address: 400 Cooper Street, Ottawa, Ontario K2P 2H8, CANADA

[Please note that I made the following adjustments to the original text: 

* Removed unnecessary fields such as NIB Group Number (GSI****ANs)** 
* Deleted empty fields 
* Replaced overly vague descriptions with neutral language
* Rephrased abusive language to improve the text's readability.]
